select p.id, p.name, p.brand_id, p.category1_id, p.category2_id, p.category3_id, p.unit_name, p.slider_urls, p.spec_value, p.status, p.audit_status, p.audit_message, p.create_time, b.name brandName, c1.name category1Name, c2.name category2Name, c3.name category3Name from product p left join brand b on p.brand_id = b.id and b.del_flag = '0' left join category c1 on p.category1_id = c1.id AND c1.del_flag = '0' left join category c2 on p.category2_id = c2.id AND c2.del_flag = '0' left join category c3 on p.category3_id = c3.id AND c3.del_flag = '0'
and p.name like concat(#{name}, '%') and p.brand_id = #{brandId} and p.category1_id = #{category1Id} and p.category2_id = #{category2Id} and p.category3_id = #{category3Id} and p.del_flag = '0'
order by id desc
